title: Elbow Grease All Purpose Degreaser Spray – Extra Large (1 Litre) | Removes Grease & Oil from Kitchens & Bathroom Surfaces, Outdoor, Vehicles & Fabrics
description: Product Description For a sparkling clean home, Elbow Grease All-Purpose Degreaser Spray is the ultimate go-to solution for deep cleaning. This extra-large 1-litre cleaner is designed for tackling stubborn grease, grime, and stains on fabrics, metals, and plastics. Whether it's cleaning kitchen surfaces, removing stubborn stains from fabrics, or shining up the bathroom, this heavy-duty spray effortlessly handles it all. With its fresh lemon scent, each use leaves rooms smelling zesty and fresh. Ideal as a kitchen cleaner, oven cleaner, and even an induction hob cleaner, it’s a versatile product that belongs in every collection of household essentials. With Elbow Grease All-Purpose Degreaser, there’s no need for harsh chemicals, as this solvent-free formula is safe yet highly effective. Known for its popularity among cleaning influencers and rave reviews from happy users, this is the product that truly lives up to the hype. Say goodbye to grease and hello to a spotless home with Elbow Grease – a cleaning product that works hard, so you don’t have to. Ingredients Less Than 5% Cationic Surfactants, Non-ionic Surfactants, Phosphates, Also Contains: Perfume, Limonene Directions Hard surfaces: Make sure nozzle is turned to the ON position. Spray onto a clean cloth and wipe surfaces. For tougher deposits, spray directly onto surface and wipe off with a clean cloth. Stubborn deposits may require further applications. Fabrics: Spray directly onto stain and then wash as usual. Elbow Grease will not evaporate in washing machines. Manufacturer Contact Information 151 Products Limited, The Old School House, 39 Bengal Street, Manchester, M4 6AF, UK. 151 Products (Ireland), Block 3, Harcourt Centre, Harcourt Road, Dublin 2, D02 A339, Ireland. See more
